sentences.en: Chromatophore A name generally applied to a pigment - bearing structure, usually a membrane lamella or vesicle.
sentences.cn: 承载色素的结构, 通常是细胞膜的薄层或小泡.

sentences.en: Such fibers may have lamella superstructure and the paraffin oil exists in the interlamellar region.
sentences.cn: 这种部分结晶的弹性纤维可能具有平行排列的片晶结构,石蜡油存在于片晶之间.

sentences.en: The reason that was failure is scar of between sclera lamella and bulbe r conjunctiva.
sentences.cn: 手术失败的主要原因是巩膜瓣间、球结膜瘢痕化.

trans.tran_en: a thin layer, plate, or membrane, esp any of the calcified layers of which bone is formed
